EmailTemplate.subject: Rescheduled: Jacksonville Community Lunch & Golf
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville]]> HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Due to the cold wave that we experienced on the week of our original Jacksonville Community Golf & Lunch event, we have rescheduled our event to February 21st, 2018.
We hope that you will be able to join us on this new date for an afternoon of technology discussions, networking and golf. To register just click on the link below!
When: Wednesday, February 21st, 2018 - 11:00 AM Where: TPC Sawgrass 110 Championship Way Ponte Vedra Beach, FL 32082
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>

- Your Friends at Turbonomic
